availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Columbus C. Yarnall (Bracken County and Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Bracken County and Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Hannah A. Bean Yarnall in Harrison County, Kentucky, on November 4, 1844. Father of Hannah Yarnall, James Yarnall, Sally C. Yarnall, Ellen T. Yarnall, Eric Yarnall, and Mary E. Yarnall. Farmer in Bracken County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 468B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 609.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216896.
